data.name: AirShooShoo
data.detailed_description:
Join Discord and Wishlist

I want this game to be the best it can be! Join Discord to share your ideas, participate in tests, give feedback, to make the maximum out of this old school Head-on like experience!

Tactical Online Multiplayer Shooter

Inspired by Worms, GTA2, Rocket League and Unreal Tournament this game mixes quick action - kill, die, respawn, repeat - with precision in a 2D Physics based environment. Aim and shoot with all of your weapons. Take care of fuel, boost and powerups.

Select your armory

There are tons of weapons available for everyone. Choose yours carefully, your life depends on it!

Customize your look and feel

You want to be as unique and slick, we understand that. Selecting your ship, trail, color and even your aiming cross is a must in this game!

Fight in different worlds

Maps available from all different worlds designed by different artists. Speedrun in solo, fight in a multiplayer arena, your choice.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: AirShooShoo is an online multiplayer arena gravity shooter, where you select your armoury for a fast paced combat against each other. Practice speedrunning in solo mode. Use all your weapons and resources to kill, or die just to respawn instantly for revenge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Core i5, minimum 2.2GHz (Intel Xeon is not supported)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 590
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1660

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 590
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1660
